title: doc: no link to spec
body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. http://golang.org/
2. Click "Documents"
3. Try to find the spec.

It's a trap!  You have to click on "References".

The spec might be important enough to be listed in both places, or maybe there should be
a sentence like

For the language specification, memory model, and detailed documentation for the
commands and packages, see the <a>references</a> page.
